-- Hoogle documentation, generated by Haddock
-- See Hoogle, http://www.haskell.org/hoogle/


-- | A network analysis toolkit for Haskell
--   
--   A network analysis toolkit for Haskell, based on the Network.Pcap
--   library. Currently not very useful, but getting there.
@package Etherbunny
@version 0.3


-- | TCP Packet access for Etherbunny.
module Network.Etherbunny.Tcp

-- | The IPPkt type gives an interface to Internet Protocol packets
data TCPPkt
getTCPPacket :: Int -> Word32 -> Word32 -> Get TCPPkt
instance Eq TCPDOECNCB
instance Ord TCPDOECNCB
instance Bits TCPDOECNCB
instance Num TCPDOECNCB
instance Integral TCPDOECNCB
instance Enum TCPDOECNCB
instance Real TCPDOECNCB
instance Show TCPDOECNCB
instance Show TCPPkt


-- | IP Packet access for Etherbunny.
module Network.Etherbunny.Ip

-- | The IPPayload type is used to store each of the possible payload that
--   etherbunny knows about
--   
--   The IPPkt type gives an interface to Internet Protocol packets
data IPPkt

-- | Represents both the IP version and IP Header Length as a single Word8
data IPVerIHL
getIPPacket :: Get IPPkt
instance Eq IPTOS
instance Ord IPTOS
instance Bits IPTOS
instance Num IPTOS
instance Integral IPTOS
instance Enum IPTOS
instance Real IPTOS
instance Show IPTOS
instance Eq IPProtocol
instance Ord IPProtocol
instance Bits IPProtocol
instance Num IPProtocol
instance Integral IPProtocol
instance Enum IPProtocol
instance Real IPProtocol
instance Show IPProtocol
instance Eq IPFlagsFragment
instance Ord IPFlagsFragment
instance Bits IPFlagsFragment
instance Num IPFlagsFragment
instance Integral IPFlagsFragment
instance Enum IPFlagsFragment
instance Real IPFlagsFragment
instance Show IPFlagsFragment
instance Eq IPVerIHL
instance Ord IPVerIHL
instance Bits IPVerIHL
instance Num IPVerIHL
instance Integral IPVerIHL
instance Enum IPVerIHL
instance Real IPVerIHL
instance Show IPVerIHL
instance Show IPPkt


-- | General Packet support Etherbunny.
module Network.Etherbunny.Packet
class Pkt a
wordsToInt :: Bits a => Int -> [Word8] -> a
wordsToWord16 :: [Word8] -> Word16
wordsToWord32 :: [Word8] -> Word32
instance Pkt Int


-- | Ethernet Packet access for Etherbunny.
module Network.Etherbunny.Ethernet

-- | The MACAddr type gives a useful interface to MAC Addresses
data MACAddr

-- | The EthType type is designed to show the type of payload in an
--   Ethernet packet
data EthType

-- | The EthPkt type defines an Ethernet II packet with another Packet
--   payload
data EtherPkt
getEtherPacket :: Get EtherPkt
instance Show EtherPayload
instance Num EthType
instance Eq EthType
instance Eq MACAddr
instance Ord MACAddr
instance Bits MACAddr
instance Num MACAddr
instance Integral MACAddr
instance Enum MACAddr
instance Real MACAddr
instance Show EtherPkt
instance Show EthType
instance Show MACAddr
